overview: Rajesh Banerjee came to Ranipur to visit his father Vabesh Banerjee. Vabesh Banerjee is a greedy businessman and a loose character. Vabesh wants to stand for election and to reduce his declarable wealth he gifts his money to his son. Vabesh's wife reveals the whole plot to Rajesh and Rajesh cannot accept his ways. The police is brought in and Vabesh commits suicide unrepentant till the end
title: Bagh Bondi Khela
